炎症性肠病与脊柱关节炎之间的联系被发现炎症性肠病 (IBD) 与脊柱关节炎（一种导致关节疼痛和僵硬的疾病）之间存在密切联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Link- Between-itis-bowel-disease-and-spondyloarthritis-revealed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Link- Between-itis-bowel-disease-and-spondyloarthritis-revealed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c38cd16a-edca-4983-bd34-a371e3b80c20 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 07:46:13 -0400 Link between inflammatory bowel disease and spondyloarthritis revealed

二十年来瑞典心力衰竭死亡率下降卡罗林斯卡学院的一项新研究表明，过去 20 年来瑞典心力衰竭死亡率有所下降。该研究已发表在《欧洲心力衰竭杂志》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Heart-failure-mortality-declines-in-Sweden-over-two-decades.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Heart-failure-mortality-declines-in-Sweden-over-two-decades.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73cd4da9-f9f0-4ef2-8d11-2a25450547ec Mon, 28 Oct 2024 07:21:49 -0400 Heart failure mortality declines in Sweden over two decades
Bedfont® Scientific Limited 举办富有洞察力的小组讨论以表彰 Stoptober Stoptober 每年十月在英国举行。该活动鼓励吸烟者戒烟 28 天。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-Host-an-Insightful-Panel-Discussion-in-Recognition-of-Stoptober.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-Host-an-Insightful-Panel-Discussion-in-Recognition-of-Stoptober.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc9799c7-d210-4ba5-b8dd-ae59e340e3bb Mon, 28 Oct 2024 07:09:00 -0400 Bedfont® Scientific Limited Host an Insightful Panel Discussion in Recognition of Stoptober
拟议的联邦供热规则如何挽救这些工人的生命2020 年 7 月一个闷热的下午，贝琳达·雷蒙斯 (Belinda Ramones) 接到电话说她哥哥住院了。雷蒙斯说，这个电话是他本周加入的佛罗里达园林绿化公司戴维树专家公司的一位女士打来的。当她到达时，她说：“我弟弟从手到脚趾都肿了。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/How-a-propose-federal-heat-rule-might-have-saved-these-workerse28099-lives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/How-a-propose-federal-heat-rule-might-have-saved-these-workerse28099-lives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1461027-0962-4beb-95cd-37e435172690 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 07:07:57 -0400 How a proposed federal heat rule might have saved these workers’ lives
美国黑人的健康状况仍然较差。这就是为什么进展这么慢的原因四月底的一天早晨，瑟古德·马歇尔高速公路沿线的一家砖砌小诊所里挤满了病人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Black-Americans-still-suffer-worse-health-Heree28099s-why-theree28099s-so-little-progress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Black-Americans-still-suffer-worse-health-Heree28099s-why-theree28099s-so-little-progress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7bfeefac-5997-4f6b-a552-a476a8829713 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 06:43:15 -0400 Black Americans still suffer worse health. Here’s why there’s so little progress
研究发现开心果可能有助于预防视力丧失一项研究发现，食用开心果可显着增加黄斑色素的光密度，可能防止健康成年人视力丧失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Study-finds-pistachios-might-help-guard-against-vision-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Study-finds-pistachios-might-help-guard-against-vision-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=224fd582-13fa-4825-be29-85a87b2f4d9e Mon, 28 Oct 2024 06:41:00 -0400 Study finds pistachios might help guard against vision loss
研究表明，剧烈运动会抑制饥饿激素研究表明，高强度运动通过降低生长素释放肽水平来抑制食欲，并且在男性和女性参与者之间观察到不同的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Hunger-hormone-suppressed-by-intense-exercise-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Hunger-hormone-suppressed-by-intense-exercise-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c1086f1-d86c-49fe-85df-f50196f673aa Mon, 28 Oct 2024 06:37:00 -0400 Hunger hormone suppressed by intense exercise, study suggests
臭氧对慢性肾损伤患者有效在一项为期 24 周的试验中，索马鲁肽使慢性肾病和肥胖患者的蛋白尿减少了 52%，并改善了肾脏健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Ozempic- effective-for-病人-with-chronic-kidney-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Ozempic- effective-for-患者-with-chronic-kidney-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=551fabad-9328-4396-9d73-4f638e753c80 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 06:15:00 -0400 Ozempic effective for patients with chronic kidney damage
新研究探讨抗菌药物暴露如何影响帕金森病风险接触抗生素显示出对帕金森病的潜在保护作用，而抗真菌药物的使用则与风险增加有关，表明微生物组的参与。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/New-research-explores-how-antimicrobial-exposure-affects-Parkinsone28099s-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/New-research-explores-how-antimicrobial-exposure-affects-Parkinsone28099s-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa2acd8f-3138-4f9f-8d36-f2a3f285fa97 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 06:13:00 -0400 New research explores how antimicrobial exposure affects Parkinson’s disease risk
